rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0504, 2619, 3189, 3818, 3850, 4412, 4435, B6004}
Unit was previously coded {AFF4281%, AFF5280%, BFC5280, BFF5280, FIN4281}

description: Topics include managing interest rate risk; foreign exchange risk; liquidity risk and the cash flow cycle; credit risk; capital risk; debt and investment risk and managing the risk of derivative products.
